name: My English Coach: Para Hispanoparlantes
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

LEARN ENGLISH IN ONLY 15 MINUTES A DAY!

INCLUDES AN ENGLISH DICTIONARY!
  • EASY TO LEARN, FUN TO PLAY - Entertaining lessons and fun mini-games effortlessly teach you the English Language.
  • EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO SPEAK LIKE A NATIVE - Voice recording and playback features help perfect your pronunciation by comparing your voice to a native speaker's.
  • TRAVEL WITH CONFIDENCE - Includes helpful information for first-time English speakers visiting the country.
